OPTION_DESC_CUSTOM_COLORS:
Colouring bound is marked as [int:hexcolor] e.q. [lower than this value : will be this hexcolor]
The values should incremental from lower to higher and last value should be valueless.
For example [5000:#ff0000],[10000:#ffff00],[:#ffffff] means three different bounds.
Anything under 5000 rubles, will be red.
Anything under 10000 rubles, will be yellow.
The third is marked as the ultimate color. Anything over 10000 rubles would be white.
OPTION_DESC_IGNORE_MAX_OFFER_SLOTS: Will ignore the max offer slots when selling to the flea market. NOTE: If you DO have limits, this will not bypass it.
OPTION_DESC_ONE_BUTTON_QUICK_SELL: Selling is done using LMB only. Attempts to sell to flea and then to trader if the option is enabled
OPTION_DESC_QUICK_SELL_FLEA: Enables quick selling to the flea market. NOTE: Does nothing if '{0}' is disabled.
OPTION_DESC_QUICKSELL_MODIFIER: Modifier to enable quickselling. Two button mode: Left Mouse Button sell to trader. Right Mouse Button sell to flea. One button mode: Left Mouse Button both
OPTION_DESC_SHOW_BEFORE_UNLOCK: Will show the flea market button before the flea market is unlocked. NOTE: This will not allow you to sell the item.
OPTION_DESC_SHOW_ONLY_TOTAL_VALUE: Will hide the unitary prices, showing only the total of the stack.
OPTION_DESC_SHOW_PRICES: Shows the prices of the items in the inventory.
OPTION_DESC_SHOW_PRICES_IN_RAID: Shows the prices of the items while in raid.
OPTION_DESC_TRADER_BLACKLIST: Separate values by comma, must use trader's id which is usually their name. The trader Id can also be found in user/mods/%trader_name%/db/base.json.
OPTION_DESC_TRADER_IF_NO_FLEA_SLOTS: Will sell to trader if there is no offer slots. NOTE: Does nothing if '{0}' is enabled.
OPTION_DESC_USE_CUSTOM_COLORS: Enables the custom colors available in '{0}'.
OPTION_TITLE_TRADER_IF_NO_FLEA_SLOTS: Sell to trader if no flea slots left
